competency_framework.name: Professional Competency Assessment
competency_framework.description: Comprehensive competency framework for technical professionals

Programming/Software Development.description: Coding, technical implementation, software engineering practices

levels.1: Learning - Beginning to apply programming concepts with guidance
levels.2: Developing - Building programming proficiency with occasional support
levels.3: Practicing - Demonstrating consistent programming skills independently
levels.4: Mastering - Advanced programming proficiency, able to guide others
levels.5: Leading - Expert level programming, driving technical innovation

Solution Architecture.description: System design, technical architecture, platform decisions

levels.3: Practicing - Designing components within larger systems
levels.4: Mastering - Leading architectural decisions for projects
levels.5: Leading - Setting architectural standards across organization

Project Management.description: Planning, execution, resource management, delivery coordination

levels.2: Developing - Managing small projects or project components
levels.4: Mastering - Managing complex projects and mentoring others
levels.5: Leading - Setting project management standards and practices

Problem Management.description: Issue resolution, root cause analysis, troubleshooting

levels.3: Practicing - Analyzing and solving complex problems

Innovation.description: Creative solutions, process improvement, new technology adoption

levels.3: Practicing - Driving meaningful innovations in work area
levels.5: Leading - Fostering culture of innovation organization-wide

levels.1: Learning - Working effectively within immediate team
levels.3: Practicing - Facilitating collaboration across diverse groups
levels.4: Mastering - Building strategic partnerships and alliances
levels.5: Leading - Creating collaborative culture and practices
